instructions:
MEAT FILLING
1/2 lb ground beef
1/2 lb pork sausage
3/4 cup cooked rice
1/2 cup chopped onion
1/4 cup chopped parsley
1/4 tsp salt

Combine above in a bowl and mix well. Divide the mixture into 8 equal portions and set aside
PREPARE CABBAGE ROLLS
6 ginger snaps, crumbled
Choose a cabbage head with pliable outer leaves, not one that has been trimmed by grocer with heavy
core leaves. Prepare 8 cabbage leaves by cutting out the core of the of cabbage, and gently remove the leaves
*(remove a couple extra in case they tear)*. Drop the leaves in a large pot of boiling water for about 3 minutes
or until limp.
Place a meat portion at the stem end of a cabbage leaf. Fold left side in, then right side in and roll up.
Arrange each roll seam side down in a 6 x 10 x 2 inch Pyrex
baking dish. Pour tomato sauce over meat rolls and sprinkle with ginger snap crumbs. Cover with foil and
bake
for 30 minutes in a 350 F oven. Uncover and bake for an additional 30 minutes.
May be frozen after baking. If frozen, thaw and bake at 350 F for 30 minutes wrapped in foil. Unwrap,
baste with juices and continue baking for 15 minutes uncovered. 
*(Rev. 8/15/97)*.
ingredients: Simmer above ingredients for 30 minutes uncovered and set aside.
name: Cabbage Rolls
